title: How do u your shopping?
content:

title: Re: How do u your shopping?
content:
I do both. These days I'm more inclined to order something from the net and wait a bit for it to arrive than to physically leave home and go to some store. Although that happens too. And food I always go to buy by myself. It'd be rather impossible to order it from America or somewhere.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: How do u your shopping?
content:
I almost always go out to buy my stuff physically, although I will purchase things online if I'm unable to find whatever item I'm after in-store, or if there's some special discount for buying the item online.--------------

title: Re: How do u your shopping?
content:
Rorie why do you have a junk as your avatar?

Back on topic: I try to shop in real shoping centres but they usually don't have what I'm looking for so I must of the time I buy stuff online, it's also 20% more cheaper.-----------------

title: Re: How do u your shopping?
content:
He has a beard and longish hair.. isn't that Jesus?

I can only remember buying something online once, but it was just a regular shop I placed an online order, because I couldn't find what I wanted close to where I live.
I'd buy stuff online, but I simply never needed to.Retodon8

title: Re: How do u your shopping?
content:
I often go to stores. But for my hobby (old game collecting) online stores are just better.____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

title: Re: How do u your shopping?
content:
I go to the supermarket, liek any normal person.

I would classify games and equipment etc as somewhat distinct from basic shopping as they're more of a one off purchase than everyday needs.

Online grocery shopping was an awesome flop.Szevvy Forever!
And Spleen never!
